title: Brad Stone Talks Amazon Unbound on Twitter Spaces: Businessweek
itunes:title: Brad Stone Talks Amazon Unbound on Twitter Spaces: Businessweek
description:
Bloomberg Businessweek editor Joel Weber speaks with Bloomberg Technology editor Brad Stone, author of the new book Amazon Unbound, which the magazine excerpted for this week’s cover story, “The Untold Story of How Jeff Bezos Beat the Tabloids.” Their conversation originally aired on Twitter Spaces.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
